price: 169. Išskyrus Pragaro kelią, gyventi jame amžinai. Ir tai visada lengva Allahui. [23]
arabic: إِلَّا طَرِيقَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۚ وَكَانَ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٗا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: illā ṭarīqa jahannama khālidīna fīhā abadan wakāna dhālika ʿalā al-lahi yasīran
